statements: SELECT * FROM influencer_profiles WHERE influencer_id = 1;
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count FROM influencer_profiles WHERE engagement_rate > 5.0;
SELECT * FROM influencer_profiles ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC, follower_count ASC;
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count FROM influencer_profiles WHERE follower_count BETWEEN 10000 AND 50000;
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM influencer_profiles WHERE follower_count > 5000 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count FROM influencer_profiles WHERE engagement_rate > 5 ORDER BY follower_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencer_profiles WHERE follower_count BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY influencer_name ASC;
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM influencer_profiles WHERE follower_count > 5000 AND influencer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_influencers FROM influencer_profiles;
SELECT MAX(follower_count) AS max_followers FROM influencer_profiles WHERE engagement_rate < 10;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, follower_count FROM influencer_profiles;
SELECT * FROM influencer_profiles WHERE follower_count > 10000;
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM influencer_profiles ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM influencer_profiles WHERE engagement_rate < 5.00;

SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, action, event_date FROM influencer_profiles JOIN influencer_history ON influencer_profiles.influencer_id = influencer_history.influencer_id ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencer_profiles WHERE influencer_id = 1;
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count FROM influencer_profiles ORDER BY follower_count DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_influencers, AVG(follower_count) AS avg_followers FROM influencer_profiles;
SELECT influencer_id, SUM(follower_count) AS total_followers FROM influencer_profiles GROUP BY influencer_id HAVING total_followers > 5000;
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM influencer_profiles WHERE engagement_rate BETWEEN 1.5 AND 3.0;
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count FROM influencer_profiles;
SELECT post_content, post_timestamp FROM influencer_posts;
SELECT influencer_id, post_count FROM influencer_stats;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name FROM influencer_profiles ORDER BY follower_count DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM influencer_profiles WHERE follower_count > 10000;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, follower_count FROM influencer_profiles WHERE follower_count > 10000 ORDER BY follower_count DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_posts FROM influencer_posts WHERE influencer_id = 1 AND post_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT influencer_profiles.influencer_name, influencer_stats.post_count, influencer_stats.average_likes FROM influencer_profiles INNER JOIN influencer_stats ON influencer_profiles.influencer_id = influencer_stats.influencer_id WHERE influencer_stats.average_likes > 500 ORDER BY influencer_stats.average_likes DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, follower_count, engagement_rate FROM influencer_profiles WHERE follower_count < 5000 OR engagement_rate > 0.05;

SELECT influencer_profiles.influencer_name, influencer_posts.post_content, influencer_posts.post_timestamp FROM influencer_profiles INNER JOIN influencer_posts ON influencer_profiles.influencer_id = influencer_posts.influencer_id WHERE influencer_profiles.influencer_name LIKE '%food%' ORDER BY influencer_posts.post_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count FROM influencer_profiles;
SELECT * FROM influencer_posts WHERE influencer_id = 1;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM influencer_posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT category_name FROM influencer_categories WHERE category_id = 3;
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM influencer_profiles WHERE follower_count > 10000;
SELECT * FROM influencer_profiles;
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count FROM influencer_profiles ORDER BY follower_count DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM influencer_profiles WHERE follower_count > 10000;

SELECT ip.influencer_name, ie.likes_count, ie.comments_count FROM influencer_profiles ip INNER JOIN influencer_posts ipc ON ip.influencer_id = ipc.influencer_id INNER JOIN influencer_engagement ie ON ie.post_id = ipc.post_id;
SELECT ip.influencer_name, ic.category_name FROM influencer_profiles ip LEFT JOIN influencer_categories ic ON ip.influencer_id = ic.category_id;
SELECT * FROM InfluencerProfile;
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count FROM InfluencerProfile ORDER BY follower_count DESC;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM InfluencerPost WHERE influencer_id = 'a1b2c3';
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM InfluencerProfile WHERE follower_count > 100000;
SELECT * FROM InfluencerAnalytics WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM InfluencerProfile ORDER BY influencer_name DESC, follower_count ASC;
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count FROM InfluencerProfile WHERE follower_count > 100000 ORDER BY follower_count DESC;

SELECT ip.influencer_name, ip.follower_count, ia.engagement_score FROM InfluencerProfile ip INNER JOIN InfluencerAnalytics ia ON ip.influencer_id = ia.influencer_id WHERE ia.analysis_date = '2023-01-15';

SELECT ip.influencer_name, COUNT(ic.comment_id) AS total_comments FROM InfluencerProfile ip LEFT JOIN InfluencerPost ipo ON ip.influencer_id = ipo.influencer_id LEFT JOIN InfluencerComments ic ON ipo.post_id = ic.post_id GROUP BY ip.influencer_name ORDER BY total_comments DESC;
SELECT sponsor_name, SUM(sponsorship_fee) AS total_fee FROM InfluencerSponsors GROUP BY sponsor_name HAVING total_fee > 5000 ORDER BY total_fee DESC;
